tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Our experience with Dr. Kashif Syed is simply amazing. No doubt, he is a wonderful doctor. The good thing about the doctor is that he just doesn't treat the problem from its roots but also suggests us in a way that these sort of issues doesn't arise again in future. He kept us on minimal medication and gave suggestions to improve our lifestyle and how small changes can make a big difference in our lives. We would personally recommend him. Very down to earth, empathetic and caring nature.   Thank you sir for giving us the right treatment!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post operative conditions,Intravenous,Preventive Medicine,Diabetes Treatment,kidney and gall bladder stones,
review:
Dr. Kashif is a godsend. He’s a very patient person who genuinely cares about his patients. He relates well to people and takes time to listen and takes appropriate action on the symptoms. 

He’s the best ever! Never rushed, always willing to listen and so smart. I can’t imagine going to anyone else. 

He is good at building trust with his patients. HIGHLY Grateful for his experience & wide range of knowledge. I would recommend Dr. Kashif to anyone seeking a kind, compassionate, and brilliant doctor. His staff is amazing!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Kashif taught me an extremely important lesson in medical care - to approach an illness holistically and not be anxious about it. My anxiety had caused my BP to spike and manifested other scary physical symptoms. He gave me a very patient hearing and explained in great detail about how anxiety affects physical health. He gave me a plan of action and reassured me every time I made progress. He truly is a fantastic physician who looks at not just the illness but also the person and is focused on long term wellness rather than just pushing pills your way. I am extremely grateful to be in his care!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor is very friendly and polite, good listener and understand patient Pain-points and explains the issue to patient why i caused how can we treat well, very honest and professional, doctor motivates  the patient and boost the confidence, very rare and few doctors we see like Dr. Kashif. Thank you doctor for all your support and help.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ****** ** *** **** ****** ** ********. Patient feel relax after visiting him.. Not only my mother my other family members are also satisfied with his way of treatment.. We got best doctor who has magic in his hands given by Allah..First we went to consult for my mother’s diabetes treatment which was severely high.. By his right way of treatment we got normal result..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have never gone anywhere and given a review but for Dr. Kashif, one in a million kind-of- a doctor. I wish I would have found him many many year ago,  He is what a doctor actually should be like. So please don't think twice before meeting him....you will not regret it.

Thank you

Florence Gonsalves

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Whatever i write would be less for this gem of a person. A wonderful professional and person who ensures no unnecessary tests and medicines are administered to the patients unless it is extremely important. Ensures to keep the entire conversation healthy and so positive that when you come out,you feel the best about your health, like you spoke to a family member. Thank you so much Dr.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: The doctor has been very friendly, patient and has always explained us the problem of patient in a very brief manner. We have seen a major improvement in patient's health after visiting Dr Kashif. He always goes out of the box to explain the problem and supports his patients. I would highly recommend to consult Dr. Kashif. He is one of the finest doctor we have visited.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Kasif Syed was very patient to hear all symptoms.  His approach for diagnosis is very much holistic in nature. Dr is very knowledgeable and always in the right direction . One of best doctors in Bangalore, I met recent days..He has a good network among the medical fraternity and can rightly refer accordingly. He is our family physician .

listened all our medical issues and he explained very well the causes and suggested the precautions to us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: This was my first visit and must say was quite impressed. From the staff, cleanliness, ambience everything was up to the mark. Dr. Kashif was amazing. Very attentive to my health problems and friendly. He put me on minimal medication which is the best part. ** *********** ***** ** ********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was suffering from high fever with chills daily. Consulted Dr Kashif sir as the fever was touching high temperatures even with taking paracetamols. Dr Kashif is very knowledgable and friendly doctor, he diagnosed the health issue by asking the symptoms which we didn’t observe before the fever and asked us to take very minimal tests. First thing he said don’t get panic thinking it because of corona😀. Never thought the fever is because of UTI and treatment was both home remedy as well as antibiotics for a faster recovery.. He will not give a single tablet if the problem can be treated by some home remedies. He listens our health issues with great patience and respects both ur time as well as you. It was nice meeting you sir, thank you😊

review:

We met Dr Kasif 5 month before but now her health is completely controlled. Often sickness is completely stopped. My complete family is now going to caviller hospital - Big thank you to Dr Kasif for his time, patience, care, suggetions and for right medication. 
Thank you sir
